Build a BitArray from a Byte[]

Parameters:
tb - Byte Array from which bits will be read
Throws:
ArrayTooShortException - Thrown when tb contain less bits than nbBits

BitArrayByteArray

public BitArrayByteArray(byte[] b,
                         int nbBits)
                  throws ArrayTooShortException
Build a BitArray from a Byte[]

Parameters:
tb - Byte Array from which bits will be read
nbBits - Number of bits to be read
Throws:
ArrayTooShortException - Thrown when tb contain less bits than nbBits

BitArrayByteArray

public BitArrayByteArray(byte[] tb,
                         int nbBits,
                         int bitOff)
                  throws ArrayTooShortException
Build a BitArray from a Byte[]

Parameters:
tb - Byte Array from which bits will be read
nbBits - Number of bits to be read
bitOff - bit offset from which we'll start reading
Throws:
ArrayTooShortException - Thrown when tb contain less bits than nbBits+bitOff

BitArrayByteArray

public BitArrayByteArray(byte[] tb,
                         int nbBits,
                         int bitOff,
                         int byteOff)
                  throws ArrayTooShortException
Build a BitArray from a Byte[]

Parameters:
tb - Byte Array from which bits will be read
nbBits - Number of bits to be read
bitOff - bit offset from which we'll start reading
byteOff - byte offset from which we'll start reading (reading will start at bit byteOff*8+bitOff)
Throws:
ArrayTooShortException - Thrown when tb contain less bits than nbBits+bitOff+byteOff*8
